short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What is the world celebrating today?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An international observance, also known as an international dedication or an international anniversary, is a period of time to observe some issue of international interest or concern. This is used to commemorate, promote and mobilize for action. 

By clicking the extension's icon, user is able to see what is the current day's international anniversary.

The code for this project is fully open-source and is available on GitHub:
https://github.com/anniversaries/international-anniversary
Help this project by reporting issues and contributing there!
